trans-unit.source: Identifies an object as an add-in-side adapter segment of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 將物件識別為管線的增益集端配接器區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A> and <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A> methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify an add-in-side adapter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A>和<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A>方法，維護的存放區的可用管線區段的相關資訊，請使用這個屬性來識別增益集端配接器。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A>

trans-unit.source: This attribute should be used only on types that activate the segments of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該只用於啟動的管線區段的類型。

trans-unit.source: Types that represent objects passed between the host and the add-in do not need this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 代表主應用程式與增益集之間傳遞物件的類型不需要這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.AddInAdapterAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.AddInAdapterAttribute"></xref>類別。
